ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Drones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Understanding the operation of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV) means walking in the path towards an increasingly automated and efficient workforce, further decreasing the need for human labor.\n\nThis research level will set drone's base stats to level 10.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You now have basic knowledge about drones and can now start utilize them for different tasks. This also unlocks DroneCultivator research which let you Automate your agriculture needs. \n This will set any drones base level to 10. \n Unless other settings for specific dronestation is specified.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Drones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through continuous and methodical research on drone systems, current drone presets can be improved upon and be made much more efficient than their previous versions. These new upgrades include a greater layout of drone variants capable of performing even more complex tasks.\n\nThis research level will upgrade a drone's base stats to level 15.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You have upgraded your drones with better engines and batteries and as such they now do jobs even more efficient. \n This will set any drones base level to 15. \n Unless other settings for specific dronestation is specified.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spacer Drone
ResearchProjectDef.description: As a result of perfecting aerodynamics, increase engine power, larger battery capacities, and vastly more complex artificial intelligence, drones can now operate at inconceivable levels of efficiency and will perform tasks quadruple the speed of its predecessors.\n\nThis research increases all drone base stats to level 20.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You have upgraded your drones with advanced Ai cores, this will let them do their task better than most humans will do. \n This will set any drones base level to 20. \n Unless other settings for specific dronestation is specified.
